patterns.decision_made: Stayed in safe corporate job instead of joining startup
patterns.situation_context: Fresh graduate with job offer from both established company and early-stage startup
patterns.regret_reason: Missed opportunity for rapid growth and equity that would have been life-changing

patterns.decision_made: Didn't pursue relationship due to career focus
patterns.situation_context: Met someone special but prioritized career advancement over relationship
patterns.regret_reason: Never found that connection again, career success felt hollow

patterns.decision_made: Chose college major based on parents' wishes
patterns.situation_context: Wanted to study art but parents insisted on engineering
patterns.regret_reason: Spent years in a career I hated, eventually had to start over

patterns.decision_made: Didn't invest in real estate when prices were low
patterns.situation_context: Had savings but was afraid of taking on mortgage
patterns.regret_reason: Prices doubled, now priced out of market

patterns.decision_made: Started own business without proper planning
patterns.situation_context: Quit stable job to pursue entrepreneurship without savings or business plan
patterns.regret_reason: Business failed, lost savings, damaged credit, set back career

patterns.decision_made: Didn't prioritize health and fitness
patterns.situation_context: Young and healthy, ignored exercise and diet
patterns.regret_reason: Developed chronic health issues that could have been prevented

patterns.decision_made: Took high-paying job in city I hated
patterns.situation_context: Chose salary over quality of life and location
patterns.regret_reason: Money wasn't worth the misery, eventually left anyway

patterns.decision_made: Didn't travel when I had the chance
patterns.situation_context: Had time and some money but chose to save instead
patterns.regret_reason: Now have money but no time, family responsibilities make it impossible

patterns.decision_made: Got married too quickly
patterns.situation_context: Married after 6 months of dating due to social pressure
patterns.regret_reason: Realized we were incompatible, painful divorce followed

patterns.decision_made: Didn't learn to code when it was easier
patterns.situation_context: Had opportunities to learn programming but thought it wasn't for me
patterns.regret_reason: Tech skills became essential, now much harder to learn

patterns.decision_made: Waited too long to have kids
patterns.situation_context: Focused on career, kept delaying starting family
patterns.regret_reason: Fertility issues made it much harder, wished I'd started earlier

patterns.decision_made: Took on massive student loan debt
patterns.situation_context: Went to expensive private school without considering alternatives
patterns.regret_reason: Debt limited life choices for years, could have gotten same education cheaper

patterns.decision_made: Didn't maintain friendships
patterns.situation_context: Got busy with work and family, let friendships fade
patterns.regret_reason: Feel isolated now, hard to make new friends at this age

patterns.decision_made: Quit job without another lined up
patterns.situation_context: Hated job and quit impulsively without backup plan
patterns.regret_reason: Struggled financially, gap in resume hurt future prospects

patterns.decision_made: Didn't save for retirement early
patterns.situation_context: Spent money freely in 30s, didn't think about retirement
patterns.regret_reason: Now facing retirement with inadequate savings, compound interest lost

patterns.decision_made: Stayed in toxic relationship too long
patterns.situation_context: Knew relationship was bad but was afraid of being alone
patterns.regret_reason: Wasted years, damaged self-esteem, missed other opportunities

patterns.decision_made: Didn't negotiate salary
patterns.situation_context: Accepted first offer without negotiating
patterns.regret_reason: Left significant money on table, affected all future raises

patterns.decision_made: Dropped out of college
patterns.situation_context: Thought I didn't need degree, wanted to start working
patterns.regret_reason: Hit career ceiling, much harder to go back later

patterns.decision_made: Moved far from family for job
patterns.situation_context: Took job across country, away from aging parents
patterns.regret_reason: Missed important family moments, parents' health declined

patterns.decision_made: Bought expensive car I couldn't afford
patterns.situation_context: Wanted to impress others, took on large car payment
patterns.regret_reason: Financial stress, depreciation, could have invested money instead

patterns.decision_made: Didn't pursue passion project
patterns.situation_context: Had idea for business/creative project but never started
patterns.regret_reason: Always wonder 'what if', someone else did similar thing successfully

patterns.decision_made: Chose graduate school over work experience
patterns.situation_context: Got master's degree instead of gaining practical experience
patterns.regret_reason: Degree didn't help career, more debt, peers with experience advanced faster

patterns.decision_made: Didn't stand up to workplace bullying
patterns.situation_context: Endured toxic boss and workplace for years
patterns.regret_reason: Damaged mental health, should have left or reported earlier

patterns.decision_made: Didn't learn second language
patterns.situation_context: Had opportunities to become bilingual but didn't prioritize it
patterns.regret_reason: Would have opened career and personal opportunities

patterns.decision_made: Bought house at peak of market
patterns.situation_context: Felt pressure to buy, purchased at inflated prices
patterns.regret_reason: Underwater on mortgage when market crashed, financially trapped
